availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kirkmansville, Kentucky physician. Robinson, Williamson County, Tennessee native. Married Moody Ann Coffman Bartlett in 1859.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 773. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Kirkmansville, p. 7. “Aged Physician Dies,” The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), February 10, 1911. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1911, Todd County, file no. 4947. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Todd County, 1859.
